name: Delicious Fruit Link
description:
"Delicious Fruit Link " is a very addictive and best match-three casual game on iTunes. Have fun playing this amazing game with beautiful graphics and delicious fruits.

Game features:
1. More than 200 challenging levels & many game props.
2. The Fire props can eliminate fruits in one row.
3. The Water props can eliminate the fruits around.
4. The Ice props can unfreeze the frozen fruits.
5. Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.

How to play:
1. Connect three or more same fruits splash to score points.
2. Archive the target points to level up.
3. Eliminate the more fruits line quickly can get extra scores.
4. Play the game and Have Fun!!!
